actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution recognizing the tenth anniversary of the National Institute of Biomedical Imaging and Bioengineering.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Commends the National Institute of Biomedical Imaging and Bioengineering for its leadership in research and its role in advancing technologies that improve patient health. Recognizes: (1) the remarkable impact that biomedical research supported by the Institute has had on patients, and (2) the importance of maintaining a strong commitment to pursuing the next generation of life-saving treatments and technologies.

titles.title: A resolution recognizing the tenth anniversary of the National Institute of Biomedical Imaging and Bioengineering.
